attributes.action: Ensure all practicing field archaeologists are registered with and approved by a single governing body.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Archaeologists are currently not governed by a single body. The IFA (Institute of Field Archaeologists) does its best to act as a governing body by setting working standards. It is not, however, a requirement for practicing field archaeologists and archaeological organisations to join the IFA. The result is that poor working standards can be evident thus undermining our protection of the countries archaeological resource.
